items.text: good length outside off, draws him forward. Patted back to the bowler
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: given lots of air, lands almost at his feet, driven back but off the toe end
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good length, but fractionally shorter which allows him to punch to long-on
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.preText: Tamzid: "Checking live updates from North Carolina. It's 3 am here, need to go to sleep. But seems like things are just getting interesting here. " - Sleep is for the weak, my friend, to quote the Australian Open
items.text: rocks back to pull this powerfully to deep square leg. Short ball that didn't rise very high
items.shortText: Paul to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: delicately nudged to third man, but just a single. Back of a length on off, good execution, opening the bat face
items.shortText: Paul to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: diving stop by Hetmyer at point too full outside off, he flays it, but Hetmyer dives to his left to save runs
items.shortText: Paul to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: just short of Roston Chase at deep point wrong choice of shot, he came down the track to a short ball, outside off, ends up slashing it in the air. It lands inches in front of Chase who was running forward
items.shortText: Paul to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.preText: What's happening here? The umpire has called a dead ball and Mushfiqur is having an animated chat. It was a back of length ball outside off, Tamim pushed it to point and was gesturing and pointing even as he was completing the shot. Eventually, the dead ball call stays
items.text: fuller ball on the stumps, driven to mid-on
items.shortText: Paul to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length ball on off, pushed to extra cover
items.shortText: Paul to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.preText: That fracas in the previous over might have been Tamim pointing at some fielding position by West Indies, maybe less than required number in circle?
items.text: tossed up, turning a bit from middle, comes forward to defend. NO-ball so it will be another free hit
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 no ball

items.text: he doesn't read the quicker one, ends up pushing at it tamely. the free hit goes unpunished
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: tossed up and defended
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: sweeps it fine but it goes off the top edge. Lands safe though at short fine
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: tossed up on off, driven down to long-on off the front foot
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: tossed up on a good length, draws him forward to defend
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: strays on the pads and is clipped to fine leg
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.preText: Captain brings himself on. Rovman Powell to bowl
items.text: fullish on the stumps, played off his toes but straight to short midwicket
items.shortText: Powell to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: good length on the stumps, gets right behind the line to defend solidly
items.shortText: Powell to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.preText: TC: "If its a matter of less fielders inside the circle, shouldn't it be a No-ball instead of Dead??" - possibly Tamim thought there were fewer fielders than there should have been, but there weren't
items.text: length ball, but on the pads, flicked off his hips to fine leg. 100 up for Bangladesh, and the second fifty has come off just 47 balls
items.shortText: Powell to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: length ball leg stump, played towards midwicket
items.shortText: Powell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: back of a length, loses his line and strays on the pads, but the batsman can't take advantage. Pushed to short fine leg
items.shortText: Powell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good length angling across the left hander, who comes on the front foot and plays it to mid on
items.shortText: Powell to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.preText: Okay, the dead ball was because fielders were swapping positions while the bowler was running in to bowl. Tamim, rightly, objected to that.
items.text: tossed up outside off, he comes forward to defend but the ball doesn't turn much and goes past the outside edge
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: top edge off reverse sweep but Tamim is safe. It plops up just behind the keeper and out of reach. He didn't get hold of it at all
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, 1 leg bye

items.text: tossed up on middle and leg, turning away, defended carefully into the off side
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run
